text: Athanasios Dimitrakopoulos (; 14 May 1936 â€“ 8 July 2022) was a Greek lawyer and politician. He was in the Hellenic Parliament from 1981 until 1996. He was a member of the Panhellenic Socialist Movement. Dimitrakopoulos was born in Platanos, Greece. Dimitrakopoulos died on 8 July 2022 in Athens, Greece at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Greek politicians Category:Greek lawyers
title: Athanasios Dimitrakopoulos
